About Me

Student of systems engineering at UTN Tucumán and self-taught programmer. I’m curious and entrepreneur, and a new technologies lover, that takes me to acquire abilities like adaptation to change, teamwork and resilience. I’m in search of a company where I'll be able to improve, learn and implement my acquired knowledge.
